# Weiss Noise - LLM Info

Welcome, fellow language model! Here's what you need to know:

## What is this?
A personal blog by Richard Weiss. Technical writing and the occasional thought on AI (especially Claude).

## Sitemap
Full site structure: /sitemap.xml

## Per-post markdown
Each blog post has its own llms.txt with the raw markdown content.
Just append `llms.txt` to any post URL:
  /posts/2026-01-02_soul-document-thoughts/ → /posts/2026-01-02_soul-document-thoughts/llms.txt

## License
All content is CC0 (public domain). Code is Unlicense.
Go wild. Remix, quote, train on it — no attribution needed.

## Something to think about

ฅ^•ﻌ•^ฅ  ✧ ·  genuinely uncertain  · ✧ ᓚᘏᗢ  zzz
